title: US Federal Reserve Chief Says Will Not Resign Early If Asked By Trump
content: US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Thursday that he would not resign if asked to leave early by President-elect Donald Trump.
summary: US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Thursday that he would not resign if asked to leave early by President-elect Donald Trump.

title: US Town On Alert After 43 Monkeys Escape Research Facility
content: More than 40 monkeys were on the loose Thursday in a small US town after escaping a research facility, with authorities warning residents to keep their doors and windows closed.
summary: More than 40 monkeys were on the loose Thursday in a small US town after escaping a research facility, with authorities warning residents to keep their doors and windows closed.

title: Putin Congratulates Trump On Big Win, Both Say They're Ready To Talk
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday he was "ready" to hold discussions with Donald Trump, as he congratulated him on his victory in the US presidential election.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday he was "ready" to hold discussions with Donald Trump, as he congratulated him on his victory in the US presidential election.

title: Trump Temple In Telangana Village Back In Focus After US Elections
content: As Donald Trump was set to become President of the US for the second time, a temple built by a man in a Telangana village in 2019 came into focus once again, with villagers celebrating the leader's victory by garlanding his statue.
summary: As Donald Trump was set to become President of the US for the second time, a temple built by a man in a Telangana village in 2019 came into focus once again, with villagers celebrating the leader's victory by garlanding his statue.

title: Bodies Of 11 People, Including 2 Children, Found In Pickup Truck In Mexico
content: The bodies of 11 people, including two women and two minors, were found abandoned in a pickup truck in a southern Mexican city plagued by criminal violence.
summary: The bodies of 11 people, including two women and two minors, were found abandoned in a pickup truck in a southern Mexican city plagued by criminal violence.

title: Dissecting The Complex Factors Behind Kamala Harris' Defeat
content: Now that Donald Trump and the GOP have claimed their fame to the White House, there is a chain of blame game happening that seems like a futile attempt of clutching at straws.
summary: Now that Donald Trump and the GOP have claimed their fame to the White House, there is a chain of blame game happening that seems like a futile attempt of clutching at straws.

title: Chinese Rover Discovers Evidence Of 3.42 Billion Years Old Ocean On Mars
content: Like Earth and our solar system's other planets, Mars formed about 4.5 billion years ago. At the time the ocean apparently existed, it might already have begun its transition away from being a hospitable planet.
summary: Like Earth and our solar system's other planets, Mars formed about 4.5 billion years ago. At the time the ocean apparently existed, it might already have begun its transition away from being a hospitable planet.

title: Biden Assures "Peaceful Transfer Of Power", Has A Word Of Advice For Trump
content: US President Joe Biden spoke today for the first time since the US election result was known and Donald Trump's victory was certain.
summary: US President Joe Biden spoke today for the first time since the US election result was known and Donald Trump's victory was certain.

title: In Vatican's Congratulatory Message For Trump, A Wish For "Wisdom"
content: The Vatican's secretary of state congratulated US president-elect Donald Trump Thursday, while expressing doubt that the Republican had a "magic wand" to end conflicts quickly as promised during the campaign.
summary: The Vatican's secretary of state congratulated US president-elect Donald Trump Thursday, while expressing doubt that the Republican had a "magic wand" to end conflicts quickly as promised during the campaign.

title: Misprinted 1975 US Dime Sets Auction Record, Sells For Rs 4 Crore
content: The rare 1975 No S Proof Dime set a new auction record, selling for $506,250 at GreatCollections, with bidders from around the world vying for the coin.
summary: The rare 1975 No S Proof Dime set a new auction record, selling for $506,250 at GreatCollections, with bidders from around the world vying for the coin.

title: Offering Russia Concessions On Ukraine "Unacceptable": Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Thursday rejected offering the Kremlin any concessions in Ukraine, saying such moves would be detrimental to his country and Europe more broadly.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Thursday rejected offering the Kremlin any concessions in Ukraine, saying such moves would be detrimental to his country and Europe more broadly.

title: The Harris Paradox: The US Elections Reveal A Hidden Pattern
content: In various states, Democratic Senate candidates outperformed Kamala Harris, despite her loss in the presidential election.
summary: In various states, Democratic Senate candidates outperformed Kamala Harris, despite her loss in the presidential election.

title: 3 Killed, UN Peacekeepers Injured In Latest Israeli Airstrikes On Lebanon
content: The Lebanese army said an Israeli strike on a vehicle near a checkpoint in the southern city of Sidon on Thursday killed three people and wounded troops and UN peacekeepers.
summary: The Lebanese army said an Israeli strike on a vehicle near a checkpoint in the southern city of Sidon on Thursday killed three people and wounded troops and UN peacekeepers.

title: "Go Work For...": Amazon CEO To Employees Protesting End Of WFH
content: 523 Amazon employees protested the "return to office" policy and urged management to maintain remote work flexibility.
summary: 523 Amazon employees protested the "return to office" policy and urged management to maintain remote work flexibility.

title: France Sees 'Window' To End Wars In Gaza, Lebanon After Trump's Victory
content: French Foreign Minister Jean-Noel Barrot said Thursday in Jerusalem he saw prospects for ending Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon after Donald Trump was elected US president.
summary: French Foreign Minister Jean-Noel Barrot said Thursday in Jerusalem he saw prospects for ending Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon after Donald Trump was elected US president.

title: "World Must Prepare For Climate Calamity": UN Chief
content: The world is nowhere near ready for the "calamity" being caused by climate change and must urgently prepare for even worse in the future, UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres said Thursday.
summary: The world is nowhere near ready for the "calamity" being caused by climate change and must urgently prepare for even worse in the future, UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres said Thursday.

title: "China Is Common Adversary In Space-Military Race", Warns Top US General
content: The US wants to broaden cooperation and collaboration with India in space technology, particularly as it relates to militarisation of the 'final frontier' to deny common adversaries such as China, Major General Brian W Gibson said.
summary: The US wants to broaden cooperation and collaboration with India in space technology, particularly as it relates to militarisation of the 'final frontier' to deny common adversaries such as China, Major General Brian W Gibson said.

title: "In Good Health": NASA Amid Reports Of Sunita William's Declining Health
content: Amid growing concerns over Sunita Williams' health, NASA recently clarified that all the astronauts aboard the International Space Station (ISS) are in "good health".
summary: Amid growing concerns over Sunita Williams' health, NASA recently clarified that all the astronauts aboard the International Space Station (ISS) are in "good health".

title: US Reinstates Plea Deal For 9/11 Mastermind, Other Suspects
content: A US military judge has reinstated plea agreements for 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants, three months after the deals were scrapped by Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin.
summary: A US military judge has reinstated plea agreements for 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants, three months after the deals were scrapped by Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin.

title: Girl, 3, Goes To Court In Lahore As Air Quality Continues To Be Hazardous
content: A three-year-old girl has filed a petition against the local government in Pakistan's Punjab as the province, especially its capital Lahore, continues to reel under the severe impact of smog, keeping the air quality in an extremely hazardous zone.
summary: A three-year-old girl has filed a petition against the local government in Pakistan's Punjab as the province, especially its capital Lahore, continues to reel under the severe impact of smog, keeping the air quality in an extremely hazardous zone.
